channel.title: Baseline Survey on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS
channel.description: Recent content in Baseline Survey on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: QField for Environmental Impact Assessment
item.description:
EIA fieldwork

  • Baseline surveys and constraints mapping
  • Monitoring and mitigation checks
  • Stakeholder and site access documentation

Works with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Prepare symbology, rules, and forms in QGIS. Sync and collaborate with QFieldCloud for timely reviews.
